title: ATF support for 2008-2014 series "Sons of Anarchy"

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: ATF support for 2008-2014 series "Sons of Anarchy"
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

ll documents pertaining to collaboration between the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) and the production of the 2008-2014 FX series "Sons of Anarchy." Such documents may include, but should not be not limited to, script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of the ATF and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "Sons of Anarchy," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: ATF support for 2024 A&E true crime show "Secrets of the Hell's Angels"

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: ATF support for 2024 A&E true crime show "Secrets of the Hell's Angels"
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

ll documents pertaining to collaboration between the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) and the production of the 2024 A&E true crime show "Secrets of the Hell's Angels," specifically Season 1, Episode 1, titled "Hell's Agents." Such documents may include, but should not be not limited to, script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of the ATF and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "Secrets of the Hell's Angels," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo
